name: The Lamp of Direction
description: As detailed in The Sages Rant Book 1 Chapter 3: Red, White, and Blue, The Lamp of Direction is a special barber pole that can basically perform as a compass. This artifact can point the user in the best direction. It may also direct the user to a perilous path. The Mustachios traversed the complex route in order to find this at the Grass Grin Maze.
